attributes.action: Block london's fire service commissioner from gender recognition stupidity.
attributes.additional_details:
London's fire service commissioner says she wants Fireman Sam to be renamed Firefighter Sam. She says it's about inspiring young girls that becoming a firefighter is an option open to them.

Would a name change make a difference? https://t.co/GykCAyDvQc
attributes.background:
London's fire service commissioner says she wants Fireman Sam to be renamed Firefighter Sam. She says it's about inspiring young girls that becoming a firefighter is an option open to them.

What next? Post person pat? Woman can do that to? Bi curious georgina..? Because we have female monkeys!
